page.title: 18WEST MONKTON PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: The children and teachers have just moved to new buildings,some 50 metres along School Road.The old building(in use for 139 years)proved to be out of date. The children treated the move as a big adventure.They like the new clean toilets and big playing fields.The headmaster said he prefered the new building because of the facilities,but he missed the old for its character. The new school has a main building and one mobile classroom. There are 4 classes of about 26 kids. The head teaches one of these.He does the administration on Wednesday and Thursday mornings;a part time teacher takes his class. 40-50 children have school meals.The children love sport.The school netball and football kits are purple,the same colour as the school uniform.
